message.original: 錬金の証 アルケミスト戦術試練
アルケミストの基本戦術を学ぶため 修練の祠にて試練に挑む
message.translation: Undergo the Alchemist trial at the training chapel.

message.original: 修練の祠内のウィルソンと話す
message.translation: Speak with Wilson at the Training Chapel.

message.original: アルケムで錬成物質を付着させ、敵の注意を引け
message.translation: Grab enemy attention by catalyzing an enemy with Alchema!

message.original: クラスターで錬成物質を付着させ、敵の注意を引け
message.translation: Grab enemy attention by catalyzing an enemy with Cluster!

message.original: 錬成物質をさらに付着させ、より敵の注意を引け
message.translation: Draw further enemy attention by applying even more catalysts!

message.original: アルケムフーガで敵の攻撃を避けろ
message.translation: Avoid an enemy's attack with Alchema Fugue!

message.original: 錬成物質を敵に2体以上付着させよ
message.translation: Place catalysts on 2 or more enemies!

message.original: 敵に付着した錬成物質をエリクシルで解放せよ
message.translation: Use Elixir to detonate the catalysts accumulated on an enemy!

message.original: 最奥の敵にしがみつきコンクラスターで攻撃せよ
message.translation: Climb the enemy in the far room and attack with Concencluster!

message.original: 最奥にある＜錬金の証＞を入手する
message.translation: Retrieve the ＜Mark of Transmutation＞ in the far room.

message.original: 白竜神殿のレンテンに経緯を報告する
message.translation: Report back to Renton in White Dragon Temple.
